channel.title: Good place to download xbox360 games?
channel.description: i recently flashed my xbox but i cant find anywhere to download games. I tried searching on warez-bb but they really only have wii games.

item.title: Good place to download xbox360 games?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“cumescape, post:41, topic:346546”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=442926.msg3256542#msg3256542 date=1278154712]

[quote author=Ollie link=topic=442926.msg3256015#msg3256015 date=1278107766]
I would use usenet but its so expensive compared to rapidshare.
[/quote]It’s also 999x more work and speeds are complete shit. I’ve used several rapidshare premium accs in the past, and i’ve never gone beyond 1.3mb/s + massive fluctuations in speed just like torrents.
[/quote]Then quit downloading shit torrents.[/quote]

Easier said than done, the only time I get >300kb/s from a single seeder is from a Europe, or most like a Russian fag and that’s very rare. TBP reporting 30 seeders no peers, think it’s good? Go open it up, 10 seeders and no peers are online, still shit speeds.

Public trackers of course, private trackers you need to spend just as much time seeding/paying for a seed box to not be booted off to the point where usenet seems a viable option(you know, max speed 24/7 no uplading at all).

cumescape:

Meh always downloading off of TPB and never go under 800KB/s (when your “fluctuations” occur almost never)with any torrent I download.

It’s fine if you only download popular shit or well seeded stuff to begin with the for anything else good luck getting >20 seeders online at once and for anything even remotely obscure enjoy 1-2 seeder

Just trying out a torrent, surprisingly I’m getting a good speed of 1.3mb/s average(still another 1mb/s to go before my connection even starts to limit this torrent…), though I should say unsurprisingly since it was the most fucking seeded, least peers mw2 torrent on tbp uploaded just over a month ago, the 5 mins or so I tried only 6 peers to 90+ seeders online(about 20 giving me 60kb/s each)

Here’s a picture of what I mean. uTorrent to the left, crappy speed fluctuations(much, MUCH worse when you don’t have 12 seeders for every peer online), and on the right is a picture of a sample usenet speed drawn by an expert artist, max connection speed, absolutely no fluctuations

Read full topic

[quote author=la­wl link=topic=442926.msg3255707#msg3255707 date=1278092147]

1.5mb/s isn’t that bad you dipshit.
[/quote]Yes it is, and even then, the speed fluctuates a lot on public torrents because of seeds connecting/disconnecting, also it hogs your connection due to seeding as well which means you can’t do much else while downloading stuff.

except on public trackers you dont have to upload at all… and i never do
[/quote]If u dont seed most trackers lower ur dl speed tho

public ones don’t. hence why I almost always download at 1MB/s and never upload and only use public trackers aaaaaa i say this every post and you always ignore me[/quote]I know thepiratebay does, even if it is public.

item.description:

[quote=“Uriko, post:8, topic:346546”][quote author=Ollie link=topic=442926.msg3252745#msg3252745 date=1277887813]
www.warez-bb.org
www.projectw.org

Those are for RapidShare style HTTP links to download games (MAX speed)
[/quote]^^the most retarded way to download games i’ve ever heard of, pretty much, buy a rapidshare account and your good… otherwise stick with the free torrents approach (i’d assume she wouldn’t wanna pay for a bunch of bullshit since she’s flashing her 360…)

BCG is the best, bitgamer is a close second

black-cats isn’t that hard to get into essentially, but if you google it, there’s a firefox addon you can use to check when they open invites (which is pretty often throughout the day, that is, if they still do it like that)[/quote]

Funny you say that
It cost me around $100 to flash it.
And I have a premium account
